mapper.select: select m.id,m.img,r.grade,r.content,r.regdate, nvl((select rm.save_filename from review_img rm where rm.num = r.review_img_num),0) save_filename, nvl((select rm.img_path from review_img rm where rm.num = r.review_img_num),0) img_path from review r, member m where r.member_num = m.num and r.shop_num = #{shop_num} order by r.regdate desc
